title: Do Riot block ip from country outside America ?
body: i'm from Vietnam , asia and i can't log in to LOL anymore a few days until now . I test with VPN to fake America's IP and i can log in , but game so lagg . May i ask Riot ban Asia ip ?

replies.body:
Nope, we don't block IPs accessing the NA servers outside of North America. We've seen some issues with routes coming from Vietnam recently and since the VPN works you around the connection error, you'll want to contact your ISP about this so they can investigate.

Let me know if you have any questions.
